First Blog Post: Testing HTML to Markdown

Published on January 15, 2024 by Blog Author

Introduction

Welcome to our first blog post! This post serves as a comprehensive test of our HTML to Markdown conversion capabilities.

What We're Testing

  • Article metadata extraction - Including publish dates, authors, and tags
  • Rich text formatting - Bold, italic, and other inline styles
  • Code blocks and inline code
  • Links and references

Code Examples

Here's a simple code example:

function convertHtmlToMarkdown(html) {
    return processHtml(html);
}

And some inline code: generateLlmsTxt()

Conclusion

This blog post demonstrates various HTML elements that should be properly converted to Markdown format.

Learn more about our testing methodology or return to the homepage.
